description: factual question-answer pairs used for small-scale LLM evaluation experiments. Questions are designed to test factual correctness under varying sampling parameters.

questions.question: Who has the most NBA championships as a player?
What is the capital of China?
In what year was Valorant officially released?
Who is widely considered the GOAT in basketball?
questions.evaluation_note: This question is subjective; the answer reflects the most commonly cited consensus rather than an objectively verifiable fact.

questions.question: What is the tallest mountain on Earth?
Who invented the Python programming language?
Which country won the 2018 FIFA World Cup?
What year was the first iPhone released?
